article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: Mark Halperin and John Heilemann are joined by Democratic Communications Consultant Mike Feldman and Former Personal Aide to President Obama Reggie Love on "With All Due Respect" on Bloomberg Television.
